name: Giant Mantis Shrimp
movement: walk 15 ft., burrow 15 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Giant Mantis Shrimp is a Large beast known for its striking appearance, featuring vibrant colors and a powerful build.
memorable: Its ability to deal both piercing and thunder damage while grappling enemies makes it a unique threat.
goals: Typically hunts prey in aquatic environments.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other aquatic beasts.
environment: Found in aquatic environments, often lurking in burrows or coral reefs.
strengths: Strong melee attacks and unique thunder damage ability, combined with truesight.
weaknesses: Very weak mental attributes, making it susceptible to manipulation.
attacks: Can perform multiattacks with range, dealing piercing damage and potential stunning thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to stun and deafen opponents with its Sonic Claw attack.
senses: Has truesight out to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions.
skills: Possesses average perception, allowing it to detect threats around it.
additional_information: Has a special ability that enhances intimidation tactics.
Utilizes its environment for stealthy ambushes.
Can blind multiple foes with a water jet attack.
Effective in both melee and ranged tactics.
Can reposition itself in combat while avoiding opportunity attacks.
